title: A ‘Luxe’ Brooklinen Duvet Cover Is 28 Percent Off
text:
1 item in this article Photo: courtesy of the retailer

We like to pop into the Brooklinen “Last Call” section every now and again to see what’s what. Usually, the sheets, duvets, and pillowcases on sale are only available in non-ideal colors and limited sizes, but this Luxe Duvet Cover caught our eye: It’s a stately “solid smoke” gray comforter, made from 100 percent long-staple Turkish cotton, and on sale in twin, full/queen, and king. Says one recent very pleased customer (who also ordered the Luxe sheets, which are not on sale): “This is the most amazing set of linens I have owned for my bed. They are light and airy and make you feel like your bed has just elevated to a whole new level.” Incidentally, if you apply the discount code “KENT” at checkout you can get an extra 10 percent off, making this an even better deal than we initially thought!

Brooklinen Luxe Duvet Cover, Full/Queen, Solid Smoke $111 (was $139, now 20% off) $111 at Brooklinen Buy with code: KENT
